DocAttribute.Name: NominalDiameter
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal diameter defining the cross-section size of the reinforcing bar.

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The effective cross-section area of the reinforcing bar.

DocAttribute.Name: BarLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: The total length of the reinforcing bar. The total length of bended bars are calculated according to local standards with corrections for the bends.

DocAttribute.Name: BarRole
DocAttribute.Documentation: The role, purpose or usage of the bar, i.e. the kind of loads and stresses it is intended to carry.

DocAttribute.Name: BarSurface
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indicator for whether the bar surface is plain or textured.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType shall be given, if the bar role type is set to USERDEFINED.
